Notes:Category.Notes:Note: This folder will be populated with items of various kind. Initially clothing, divided into folders based on the era the clothing is appropriate for -- these will be: - ageless - medieval - renaissance - edwardian - victorian - modern - contemporary ... The naming conventions for items in these folders are: - all lower-case; Clothing is wrong, clothing is right. - categories in plural; accessory is wrong, accessories is right - items in singular; towels is wrong, towel is right - pair-style-items in plural; boot is wrong, boots is right
